speakers.name: Kenneth L. Molina
speakers.description: Data-Driven and result-oriented consulting professional with over ten (10) years of experience in implementing technology and operational improvement solutions in the Telcommunication, Banking and Finance industries, in a global context.

speakers.name: Ellen Solosod
speakers.profession: Deputy Chief Information Security Officer Cyber Security Operations Group
speakers.description: Ellen has more than 20 years of experience in managing and overseeing complex Information Technology, Network, and Cyber Security Projects. She is a Portfolio, Program, and Project Management Practitioner who leads project strategy, planning, implementation, and operationalization. She is Assistant Vice President and PLDT-SMART Deputy CISO, reporting directly to the PLDT Group CISO.
